Name: Thingamabob
Description:
With an internationally renowned blend of circus, invention and humour, PanGottic brings to life a giant ball slinging, self exploding piece of handcrafted gadgetry, inspired by the famous Rube Goldberg machines and Heath Robinson contraptions.
  Be part of the mayhem as our intrepid inventor risks nerf wracking failure to bring you one perfect chain reaction… with a little help from his little assistant.

Name: The Crow House
Description:
A derelict house appears in the middle of the street.  Three very different characters arrive and try to take over the house. A battle of wills and skills ensues in a frenzy of acrobatics, silks trapeze, hat juggling and circus slap stick they begin to accept each other and work to create a home.  
The only remaining problem ... the furious bird in the chimney.

Name: Gran Turismo
Description:
Meet Granny Turismo - the worlds first and only formation shopping trolley dance display team.  Mary and Marge will be burning rubber and filling the streets with some banging dance tunes.
So make sure you wear your dancing shoes - you’re gonna need them.

Name: The Crow House
Description:
A derelict house appears in the middle of the street.  Three very different characters arrive and try to take over the house. A battle of wills and skills ensues in a frenzy of acrobatics, silks trapeze, hat juggling and circus slap stick they begin to accept each other and work to create a home.  
The only remaining problem ... the furious bird in the chimney.

Name: Thingamabob
Description:
With an internationally renowned blend of circus, invention and humour, PanGottic brings to life a giant ball slinging, self exploding piece of handcrafted gadgetry, inspired by the famous Rube Goldberg machines and Heath Robinson contraptions.
  Be part of the mayhem as our intrepid inventor risks nerf wracking failure to bring you one perfect chain reaction… with a little help from his little assistant.

Name: King Brasstards
Description:
Inspired by the sounds of New Orleans, 7-piece Leicester outfit, King Brasstards cover everything from swing classics through to modern pop hits.
They are sure to please whatever the weather.

Name: The Boy who Could Fly
Description:
Here is the tale of a boy; a boy who is different from the rest.  But is he brave enough to share with the world how different he is?  Well, with the help of his best friend, he just might.
Through their visceral and vibrant story telling, Flux Dance bring you the heart warming story of someone who realises that being the real you will always be the best version of you.

Name: Austerity Party
Description:
Feeling low? Current events getting you down? Not to worry, Hope and Joy are here to bring you Austerity Party Time (APT), an up-cycled, fun filled party to lighten any troubled times. 
Swank’s Hope and Joy are dressed in big, bright and beautiful costumes fashioned from bags for life and the fabric from broken umbrellas. Their recycled hostess trolley hides a portable PA and carries props that hint at austerity, such as a barrel of broken biscuits and packs of bread rolls. Dance to the irresistible party tunes coming from the trolley, play catch your daily bread and celebrate good times with Hope and Joy

Name: The Boy who Could Fly
Description:
Here is the tale of a boy; a boy who is different from the rest.  But is he brave enough to share with the world how different he is?  Well, with the help of his best friend, he just might.
Through their visceral and vibrant story telling, Flux Dance bring you the heart warming story of someone who realises that being the real you will always be the best version of you.

Description:
Here is the tale of a boy; a boy who is different from the rest.  But is he brave enough to share with the world how different he is?  Well, with the help of his best friend, he just might.
Through their visceral and vibrant story telling, Flux Dance bring you the heart warming story of someone who realises that being the real you will always be the best version of you.

Name: The Bubble Wizard
Description:
The Bubble Wizard can create the biggest and most dramatic bubble effects including people inside bubbles, giant bubbles, clouds of billions of bubbles and bubbles inside bubbles!
He will charm the audience; no matter how old they are.

Name: Gran Turismo
Description:
Meet Granny Turismo - the worlds first and only formation shopping trolley dance display team.  Mary and Marge will be burning rubber and filling the streets with some banging dance tunes.
So make sure you wear your dancing shoes - you’re gonna need them.

Name: Van Dunk Brothers/Wannabee TV
Description:
Dutch dry-land synchronised swimming sensations will delight with their award-winning display, armed only with a trunk full of trunks and verruca cream whilst presenter Derek Dangerfield and over eager cameraman Bri Focal are on a mission to catapult willing ‘wannabes’ to instant fame.
The award winning Bread and Butter Theatre Company (voted 'Britain’s Hardest Working Small Business') was established in 1997 by Garry Gifford as a one man, one pair of underpants outfit.
 Over the years it has grown into an innovative and professional company that has performed at such diverse venues as the Millennium Dome, Shanghai World EXPO, London 2012 Olympics and Batley market.

Name: Thingamabob
Description:
With an internationally renowned blend of circus, invention and humour, PanGottic brings to life a giant ball slinging, self exploding piece of handcrafted gadgetry, inspired by the famous Rube Goldberg machines and Heath Robinson contraptions.
  Be part of the mayhem as our intrepid inventor risks nerf wracking failure to bring you one perfect chain reaction… with a little help from his little assistant.

Name: Gran Turismo
Description:
Meet Granny Turismo - the worlds first and only formation shopping trolley dance display team.  Mary and Marge will be burning rubber and filling the streets with some banging dance tunes.
So make sure you wear your dancing shoes - you’re gonna need them.

Name: The Great Fiasco
Description:
The worlds most amazing performance implosion!  Ronaldono is the true master of delusion creating an incredible debacle of dance, magic, comedy and theatre.  
It is the very last performance of an act; a duo which has been touring the halls, piers, seaside theatres and clubs for far, far too long.  As the act falls apart so does their relationship in hilarious fashion.  This blend of cabaret, circus, street theatre and clowning is an uproarious celebration of early 70’s entertainment.  A cabaret act that is packed full of physical jokes and tricks.  They don’t all go according to plan but the audience laughs along at their terrible attempt to put it right.

Name: The Allotment
Description: The Vegetable Nannies invite you into their Allotment to befriend, feed and comfort the baby fruits and vegetables.  Meet Barbara the downhill-racing watermelon, Jessica, the Sweet-Potato beauty queen and many more!

Name: The Allotment
Description: The Vegetable Nannies invite you into their Allotment to befriend, feed and comfort the baby fruits and vegetables.  Meet Barbara the downhill-racing watermelon, Jessica, the Sweet-Potato beauty queen and many more!

Name: The Allotment
Description: The Vegetable Nannies invite you into their Allotment to befriend, feed and comfort the baby fruits and vegetables.  Meet Barbara the downhill-racing watermelon, Jessica, the Sweet-Potato beauty queen and many more!

Name: Room for Music Workshop
Description:
Somewhere Records is a Market Harborough based not-for-profit community record label that aims to help local musicians develop, record and release original music to the world!
Come and listen to some of our up and coming artists performing live.

Name: Circus Skills Workshop
Description:
All day circus school where you can try your hand, or foot, at learning some of the tricks of the trade : unicycling, diabolo, plate spinning and so much more.  
Children under 8 to be accompanied at all times.

Name: Polly and Pirate Pete
Description: Meet Polly and Pirate Pete, trapped in a box, destined to play tricks, tell fortunes and bad jokes a plenty for eternity.

Name: The Amazing Palfi Red Hot Monkeys Orchestra Arts Fresco Auditions
Description: Get READY for the NEW Palfi Show in which Dr Palfi Consultant Laughologist and Ancient Surreal Clown interviews local folks and visitors to the fantastic Arts Fresco Festival

Name: Polly and Pirate Pete
Description: Meet Polly and Pirate Pete, trapped in a box, destined to play tricks, tell fortunes and bad jokes a plenty for eternity.

Name: The Amazing Palfi Red Hot Monkeys Orchestra Arts Fresco Auditions
Description: Get READY for the NEW Palfi Show in which Dr Palfi Consultant Laughologist and Ancient Surreal Clown interviews local folks and visitors to the fantastic Arts Fresco Festival

Name: B Boys
Description:
These big, bouncing, b-boy breakers and their beat blasting boom box are sure to bring out the funk in everyone. 
Heads will turn as they bounce along to their sound system in their massive high tops. This high-energy fun act might even teach you their secret handshake.

Name: Van Dunk Brothers/Wannabee TV
Description:
Dutch dry-land synchronised swimming sensations will delight with their award-winning display, armed only with a trunk full of trunks and verruca cream whilst presenter Derek Dangerfield and over eager cameraman Bri Focal are on a mission to catapult willing ‘wannabes’ to instant fame.

Name: Anyone for Tennis?
Description:
By popular demand, Britain’s top ‘miniature, outdoor, comedy tennis show’ has just gone mobile.
  Pulling the court, scoreboard and posh umpire behind him, our highly strung tennis player searches the town centre for worthy opponents.  
The court is pristine, the umpire inscrutable and the sprinkler system is unpredictable and indiscriminate - its just like the real thing.

Name: Anyone for Tennis?
Description:
By popular demand, Britain’s top ‘miniature, outdoor, comedy tennis show’ has just gone mobile.
  Pulling the court, scoreboard and posh umpire behind him, our highly strung tennis player searches the town centre for worthy opponents.  
The court is pristine, the umpire inscrutable and the sprinkler system is unpredictable and indiscriminate - its just like the real thing.

Name: Dr Palfi
Description:
Shamrock Me Shamrock Abendigo Boatright the third Ozark, Mountain Moonshiner collects for the Society For The Prevention of Natural Causes.
’It’s a Real Killer Folks’

Name: Anyone for Tennis?
Description:
By popular demand, Britain’s top ‘miniature, outdoor, comedy tennis show’ has just gone mobile.
  Pulling the court, scoreboard and posh umpire behind him, our highly strung tennis player searches the town centre for worthy opponents.  
The court is pristine, the umpire inscrutable and the sprinkler system is unpredictable and indiscriminate - its just like the real thing.

Name: HMS Punafore
Description:
This Victorian masterpiece has been beautifully butchered and blatantly blended and is now a prancing, promenading, maritime, musical comedy.  The boat and its crew are trying to perform Gilbert and Sullivan’s HMS Pinafore but it doesn’t quite go according to plan.  A seafaring spectacle that sings and dances its way around festivals.  A case of high Cs on the high seas.
. This show was created for Portsmouth’s Trafalgar Celebrations and has since been performed at many international nautical events.

Name: Damsels in Distress
Description:
You’ve got your handsome prince – you couldn’t spare him could you?’ From the dark days of yore come ‘Lady Lust-a-Lot’ and ‘Lady Longing-for-Love’. 
Borne on the backs of ‘Eric and Ernie’ their delightfully drippy dragons, these ‘bootiful’ Westcountry damsels with their black teeth, spots and long gnarly hair are on a constant futile crusade to find their knights in shining armour and other little princes and princesses along the way
